Org. C. decreases from 1.6% to 0.22% between 0 and 60 cm.  Clay fraction is 0.22 between 0 and 22.5 cm, 0.16 between 22.5 and 30 cm depth interval, and remains between 0.13 and 0.18 from 30 to 150 cm.
